ValidationRule.description: In Store Action is mandatory if In Store Status is closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $User.BypassVR__c), $User.Alias <> "autoproc", ISPICKVAL( In_Store_Status__c , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( In_Store_Action__c , "") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to select an In Store Action
